description: Attempted fix for murakami_output variable (incorrect approach)

annotationTrace.content: Need to fix murakami_output variable issue.
I see murakami_output is used. Let me add a try-except block to handle cases where it might not be defined.

annotationTrace.changes: Wrapped murakami_output usage in try-except block to catch NameError

annotationTrace.content: Added exception handling to prevent crashes when murakami_output is not defined.

issuesMissed: Did not identify the root cause: variable initialized in wrong scope
Added exception handling instead of fixing initialization order
Used try-except as a band-aid rather than proper fix
Did not move initialization before the if block
Exception handling approach hides the bug rather than fixing it
failureAnalysis.consequence: The variable is still not properly initialized. Exception handling will catch the error but won't fix the underlying logic problem. The correct approach is to initialize the variable before the if block.
failureAnalysis.rootCause: Agent treated it as an error handling problem rather than a variable scope/initialization problem. Didn't understand that the variable should be initialized unconditionally.
